attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned hereby petition to Prime Minister to remove Alistair Darling from office for the following reasons, in our opinion:-

1)  The mishandling of Northern Rock. 

2) The mishandling of Capital Gains Taxation reform.

3) The mishandling of Non-Domicile Taxation reform.

4) The continual mishandling of personal information by HMRC.

The combination of these factors, currently in the public domain, illustrates the depth and breath of mismanagement.  Personal responsibility and accountability should be upheld and the individual removed from office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
